General.Name: Chang Wah Electromaterials Inc
General.Description: Chang Wah Electromaterials Inc. operates as an agency for packaging materials and equipment in Taiwan. It offers various IC packaging materials; IC packaging devices, such as auto molding, trim and form, and package sawing equipment, as well as fluid dispensing systems; and TFT-LCD products. It also provides LED mold technology with liquid compound/compression mold and LED lead frames for ejection molding; EMC LED lead frames for transfer molding; IC packing material; and solar power systems. The company was incorporated in 1989 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
